name: Ninja Parkour Dash 2: Escaping Vector Samurai Shurikens Fight
name_original: Ninja Parkour Dash 2: Escaping Vector Samurai Shurikens Fight
description:
Welcome back, young Ninja Apprentice. Ninja Parkour Dash 2 is finally ready for you! The Ninjatropolitan City rooftops are still serving as hideouts for the evil Scientist Samurais. It's up to you to destroy them. As always, help a ninja out and RUN LIKE YOU'VE NEVER RUN BEFORE!

Sharpen your Ninja Awareness Skills with our awesome game features such as:

- Break windows to enter indoor environments!
- Destroy the evil Scientist Samurais!
- Dominate the Ninjatropolitan City rooftops!


For more proof of official awesomeness just check out the SCREENSHOTS! Or better yet, download the game and see for yourself!
